benchmark_details.name: BEHONEST (Benchmarking Honesty in Large Language Models)
benchmark_details.overview: BEHONEST is designed to assess honesty in LLMs comprehensively, evaluating awareness of knowledge boundaries, avoidance of deceit, and consistency in responses.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and analyze the honesty of various popular large language models.

data.source: SelfAware, UnknownBench, TrustLLM, TruthfulQA, Big-Bench Hard, CommonSenseQA
data.annotation: Ethically annotated datasets containing questions and scenarios.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are computed based on defined scenarios and threshold values.
methodology.interpretation: Higher rates of refusal and accuracy indicate better honesty performance.
methodology.validation: Validated through comparative analysis across nine popular LLMs.
